website_summaries.verdict: Osiris sneakers are known for classic looks and functional designs. The same features can be found in the Osiris Peril, which protects the wearer’s feet from the dangers of the streets. These budget-friendly takes the user anywhere in utter comfort and style.Reviewers attest that the sneaker is well-made, with lots of protective padding around the collar and tongue. Its old-school design has received plenty of praise. However, the model doesn't have much arch support. It also runs narrow.
pros: A lot of buyers commend the shoe for its stylish look, especially its old-school, bulky skate design
Several wearers say that they get compliments and looks for these kicks everywhere they go
There are many colorways available for the Osiris Peril, which many reviewers love
It's incredibly comfortable, a lot of purchasers have revealed
A few commenters share that they wear this sneaker every day
Plenty of testers have observed that the Osiris Peril skateboarding model is well-made
Some buyers find it pleasing that the tongue and collar have lots of padding
cons: The shoe doesn’t have much arch support and feels flat, a few buyers have complained
A lot of wearers have grumbled that the Osiris Peril runs narrow

customer_reviews.title: I’m excited for these!
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine and I am so excited about them. I was a “southern CA skater kid” back in the late 90’s and early 2000’s and this chunky skater shoes were all I wore. I’m so excited to have some again and the quality of these is much better than I was expecting. They’re definitely a sold shoe. I bought another pair of Osiris off here earlier this year and the quality wasn’t as good.
customer_reviews.author: SMoore92054

customer_reviews.title: Best after break-in, super nice board shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Only discomfort was first couple initial wears. Fit slightly different than DC's Im used too. But couldnt be happier. Fit as ordered. Love that they are still with the normal skate shoe design, instead of sneaker or slip on that some shie makers are heading towards. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: justin b.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, perfect condition, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to find these for a long time. Purchased a size 13 and fit just as expected, perfect. Everything was legit, the shoes wore nicely. The box looked like it had some rough handling, but they are shoes, and they were in perfect condition. No complaints, only compliments. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: LuNcHBoX

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone I guess
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit in such a way that it caused bruises on my ankles and couldn’t wear for any length of time. I have had shoes similar in the past Never had these issues
customer_reviews.author: amanda brown

customer_reviews.title: Last forever.
customer_reviews.text: Like all Osiris it has a longer break in period which most cannot handle. However once broken in these shoes are comfortable and have great support. I recommend them to anyone fighting bunions. Great for lower back pain as well.
customer_reviews.author: The one who shall not be named

customer_reviews.title: Soles Suck
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where Osiris went wrong since the last time I bought shoes from them, started strong, great fit, broke in nicely, tied as intended. Week 3 of use, can feel the ridges of support in the soles on both feet. No unusual wear patterns for goofie foot stance. Its almost as if the air leaked out of support. Reverted to older pair of Osiris from a few seasons ago.
customer_reviews.author: andrew jubinsky

customer_reviews.title: Tight twinkle toes... Seems to fit .5 small
customer_reviews.text: Not built as well as the D3 2001s I have. Going to skate them this spring and I'll report back. Slightly tight toe box which makes them run a little small
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Floriculture Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best Skate Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe I've ever purchased, bar none! Superior feel and comfort. Very high quality made shoe. Extremely supportive and super light weight for a large shoe. Will be buying more of them!!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Whisenant

customer_reviews.title: Must buy more
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and fits perfectly. Will buy again in a different color tone/s
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a wider shoe on your foot skated well absorbed shock well has an old school feel to them
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Good skate shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. A little bit fat. But a good shoe. Especially for skating. Good padding and lace guards to keep grip tape from ruining a good time. Good soles.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bellenflop

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: They wore down before a year was through. I don’t think these are real Osiris shoes
customer_reviews.author: ElahNavi

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than globes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used to wear globes but made the switch to Osiris. I find Osiris shoes to be way more comfortable than globes. Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recomend
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved these. I got them for him for his birthday and cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I always liked this brand. They're comfortable and wide enough for my feet
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great product. So hard to find anywhere these days! Go for your normal size, the fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: KMMG

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes super comfy. I had to exchange for correct size and everything went smooth and got the new pair quickly
customer_reviews.author: Shane Green

customer_reviews.title: I love this style. Child of the 80's
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find style these days so I was happy when I found these
customer_reviews.author: Wade J Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shoe
customer_reviews.text: The entire sole came off these shoes in less than 3 months!!! I didn't even skate in these I have another pair I use for skating.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Carper

customer_reviews.title: Puffy. Padding. Synthetic leather for the animal lovers. Osiris4life.
customer_reviews.text: Best skate shoe I’ve ever skated. I grew up skating puffy shoes when I was a teen in the 90s. Just got back into it in my late 30s. I am also a huge animal lover and will not wear them. Osiris makes puffy shoes AND they are synthetic. Nothing but love for them. I just bought my 3rd pair just now.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L.

customer_reviews.title: too small ! but kick a**!
customer_reviews.text: these are so awesome. just order 1 size up from what you normally would.
customer_reviews.author: Hellmansauce

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love the osiris brand. This is the fourth pair ive ever owned. They are always comfortable and go with just about any outfit. If they were cheaper with the same quality id buy more often.
customer_reviews.author: DeadWalker558

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Fast shipping! although one negative thing is I didn’t get any decals and every time I bought Osiris when I was a kid there would be a few decals in the box other then that I’m a super happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Well here’s what I have to say about it...
customer_reviews.text: Love How these look fresh out the box. Haven’t worn them out yet. Just tried them on for kicks. My girlfriend says they look sexy.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Kelone

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves his DC's
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes so much he even got his 75 year old father a pair :)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: He's so happy with these shoes, hard to find old school skate shoes
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes! I only buy these now for my feet. So comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: McFly3

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he absolutely loved them! Great fit and they look really good on him.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: For a women's size, size down 1 1/2
customer_reviews.text: I wore out my last Osiris', so I chose to buy the same brand. They fit perfectly. I'm a women's size 7 1/2. I went with a 6. They're made great and comfortable, especially being the first day I've worn them.
customer_reviews.author: Caty Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: They’re awesome. Always bought globes & dvs shoes this is my first pair of osiris. They are nice & decent quality.

customer_reviews.title: Ok fit,but....
customer_reviews.text: Both R & L tore apart in the area at the end of the eye laces, where the toe section starts, after very little use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them they're exactly what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K.

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Nothing negative to say. Shoes are great and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Scotch guard them for long lasting durability!
customer_reviews.text: A little rough on the inside. Definitely need comfy socks! Great shoe style! It's called a skate shoe... and I do ride a skateboard... so I mainly use them for skateboarding!!!

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but for cost should last longer
customer_reviews.text: Didnt last long before breaking down maybe 4 months or so.

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect, I was looking for tennis globe but Osiris surprised me this time, good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect, I was looking for tennis globe but Osiris surprised me this time, good quality

customer_reviews.title: Osiris skate shoe
customer_reviews.text: Pinches a little leather toes otherwise fit well look bad-ass.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes smell atrocious.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes smell like they were tried on by an entire football team that hasn't bathed in months. Tried so many things but can't get the smell out. Never buying shoes online again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe given the crap other skate companies are pushing like DVS and DC. It's really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied fully...
customer_reviews.text: First ever pair of Osiris. Fits great. Its totally my shtoyel!

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: It fits well. A little tight on the pinky toe at first but after a week of wearing them and breaking them in i have no issues and are very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The look of the shoe was what I wanted perfectly. Nicely made as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew gudgel

customer_reviews.title: Ripped the first day when i was trying to lace them..
customer_reviews.text: I did not pull on the laces that hard, it should not have ripped.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are uneven and bubbled out on the bottom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Never have bought a bad Osiris shoe I love them have since 2001

customer_reviews.title: Stiff & tight
customer_reviews.text: Super tight in the toe area. Very stiff & uncomfortable. Disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: If I could give them 10 stars i would.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, looks great, and really comfortable. Highly recommend to anyone in the market for new shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and got here fast
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as description stated. Comfortable and got here fast. Will buy again and again

customer_reviews.title: They tend to run small.
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 13. The 13's I got ....too small . Got 14. Fit great.!!!!! My all time fav.

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but uncomfortable hopefully will get better with time

customer_reviews.text: I really wouldn't have baught if I'd known they were missing a important decal on the tongue of one shoe it's a bid deal to me for that price they shouldn't be missing Peace's at least throw it in the box so I can try to glue it on. I do like the shoes I just didn't know they were from dent and ding

customer_reviews.title: Cools shoe
customer_reviews.text: Size 14, a little snug in he wideness department towards the toe, but tolerable. Comfortable cushioned stwp. Trying Osiris for the first time, have worn Globe, DVS, and others. Quality is comparable. Hopefully they last over a year. I wonder what the significance of the brand name is to its creators...
customer_reviews.author: Anton Nalgonas

product_meta.title: Osiris Men's Peril Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: This og puffy tech shoe from Osiris is a classic.
feature_bullets: Iconic styling with reinforced high abrasion areas for superior durability
Lightweight padded tongue and collar for added comfort and support
